permissions.notificationsSubtitle: Get booking updates, local events, and exclusive offers in real time.
permissions.locationSubtitle: Get the full Adama Smart Tourism experience. Enable location access to see nearby attractions, book hotels around you, and navigate the city easily.
permissions.nearbyAttractionsDesc: Discover places close to your current location
permissions.easyNavigationDesc: Get turn-by-turn directions to your destination
permissions.personalizedRecsDesc: Receive suggestions based on where you are
permissions.privacyNote: We only use this to improve your experience. You can change this anytime in settings.

slides.discoverDesc: Your personal guide to exploring the heart of Oromia. Find top-rated hotels, attractions, and local experiences instantly.
slides.aiDesc: Discover the best of Adama with our smart travel assistant. Get personalized suggestions for hotels, attractions, and dining based on your unique preferences.
slides.bookDesc: Seamlessly purchase tickets for Adama's top attractions and get turn-by-turn directions to your next adventure.

payment.onlyChapaSupported: Only Chapa payment is currently supported.

payment.notVerifiedMsg: We couldn't verify your payment yet. If you paid, it might take a moment.

reviews.reviewSuccessDesc: Thanks for sharing your experience in Adama. Your review is now visible to the community and helps others explore.

search.tryDifferent: Try different keywords or browse categories

chat.askMeAnything: Ask me about places, restaurants, events, and more!
chat.guestMsg: Please sign in to chat with our AI Travel Assistant and get personalized recommendations.

public.heroDesc: Get assistance with bookings, payments, or any questions about Adama tourism.
public.termsIntro: Please read these terms carefully before using the Adama Smart Tourism app. By accessing or using the Service you agree to be bound by these Terms and help us keep our community safe.
public.agreementText: By clicking "Accept & Continue", you acknowledge that you have read and understood our Privacy Policy.
public.term1Content: By using Adama Smart Tourism, you agree to use our services for lawful purposes only. You must not violate any applicable laws, infringe on others' rights, or interfere with the service's operation.
public.term2Content: All bookings made through our platform are subject to availability and confirmation. We act as an intermediary between you and service providers. Prices may change based on availability and season.
public.term3Content: Cancellation policies vary by service provider. Refunds are processed according to the provider's policy. We recommend reviewing cancellation terms before booking.
public.term4Content: Users must behave respectfully towards other users and service providers. We reserve the right to suspend accounts for inappropriate behavior. Always follow local laws and regulations.
public.term5Content: All content on the Adama Smart Tourism app, including text, graphics, logos, and software, is our property and protected by copyright laws.
public.term6Content: We are not liable for any damages arising from the use of our services, including but not limited to direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages.
public.privacyIntro: At Adama Smart Tourism, we value your trust. Here is a transparent breakdown of how we handle your data while you explore the city.
public.locationDataDesc: We collect location data to provide you with nearby attractions, hotels, and services. This helps us personalize your experience and show relevant recommendations.
public.personalizedRecsDescPrivacy: Based on your location and preferences to show relevant places and events.
public.securitySafetyDesc: To ensure your account security and provide emergency services when needed.
public.serviceImprovementDesc: To analyze usage patterns and improve our app features and performance.
public.aiHeroSubtitle: We believe in transparency about how our AI systems work to help you explore Adama.
public.howItWorksDesc: Our AI Travel Assistant uses large language models and real-time tourism data to provide personalized recommendations, translations, and travel advice.
public.aiWarning: AI may occasionally generate incorrect information about prices, opening hours, or locations. Always verify critical travel details directly with businesses.
public.privacyFirstDesc: Your personal conversations are not used to train global models.
public.transparencyDesc: We clearly label AI-generated content throughout the application.
public.userControlDesc: AI is here to assist, but final decisions and bookings are always controlled by you.
public.aiLearningInfo: Our AI learns from your preferences to provide better recommendations over time.

aiTransparency.reason1Description: Within {{distance}} of your current spot in {{location}}.
aiTransparency.reason3Description: Rated {{rating}} by other tourists this week.
aiTransparency.reason4Description: Fits within your budget range of {{minBudget}}-{{maxBudget}}.
aiTransparency.aiSuggestionIntro: Our AI suggested this spot in {{location}} based on your unique travel profile.
